actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide increased flood protection in the vicinity of Santa Fe, New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project near Santa Fe, New Mexico, at an estimated cost of $3,890,000. Stipulates that the project shall not include construction of any impoundments east of the existing Nichols Dam, and that construction operations shall have a minimal adverse impact on transportation in the city of Santa Fe.

titles.title: A bill to provide increased flood protection in the vicinity of Santa Fe, New Mexico.
